author: James Tanner
method: Heat the butter in a non-stick frying pan. Add the apple slices and fry on both sides until golden and caramelised. Transfer to a serving plate. In the same pan, fry the egg, adding extra butter if needed.  Serve the fried egg on top of the apple slices.
ingredients: 15g/Â½ oz butter,  1 small apple, cored and sliced,  1 free-range egg
